channel.title: High Profile Dicing Accounts Banned
channel.description:
Hi, Today we have banned several high-profile accounts from the dicing scene. We can happily confirm that the ring leaders found to be involved in selling RuneScape gold have been banned. Their actions have directly funded a sizable portion of all real world trading activity within the game, led to increased macro use, and resulted in huge surges in spam advertising. Such actions are strictly against our rules, and all accounts have been wiped and permanently nuked. This should serve a clear warning to anyone else engaged in similar activities; expect more bans of any continuing offenders. We have been finely tuning our new anti-cheat and anti-hijack tools over the past few months and are now steadily bringing these systems online in select areas. This is part of an on-going rollout that will be completed over the course of next two months. More good news will follow in due course. Some of you may already have noticed that we have started cleaning up the high scores over the last week and this will assist us in being able to re-introduce relevant gold farmer free F2P high scores again. Mark Gerhard CEO
Now have you been hit, casey?

item.title: High Profile Dicing Accounts Banned
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:20, topic:455126”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=557998.msg4082479#msg4082479 date=1345490529]

I hope the user Dyces got banned. HE cleaned me 1.5b. Faggot. >_> Not really his fault I suppose but hes a stil a douche.

He didn’t. And it’s not dragon dyce’s fault you gambled, it’s your own. He’s actually quite a nice guy.

Just shows you don’t know him. He’s not in that gambling chat.
[/quote]

I’ve spent many hours talking to him. Have you?

He didn’t. And it’s not dragon dyce’s fault you gambled, it’s your own. He’s actually quite a nice guy.

No, KO is a manipulator and greedy. He used to be an awesome person, but now he’s just a prick who just bullshits to teenagers. Really can’t believe anything he says as he’s just a bunch of lies. Just a 30 year old who lives at home and is milking the shit out of a video game he got lucky on.

Also, dyces isn’t banned. Chatted with him a few days ago.

And as for is I was hit-Yes but nothing that changes my source of income. I won’t go into details, but what I will say is I had multiple people in a clan that was banned supplying me with daily fee’s for buying them in. This clan had been declining though, and thus means less competition for another clan which I funded a few people. I was, nor will I ever be at risk for ban because of the measures I take to insure no traces can be made back to me.

However, I have jagex mod confirmation that everyone now is being watched like a hawk in the dice clans.

Just because he banned you for that mishap with the IP addresses doesn’t make him a bad guy. As far as the greedy goes, that’s a whole different situation that I doubt you even know much about. I’m not defending the guy, I’m simply pointing out that Kozs doesn’t really know what he’s talking about here. I won’t deny most of your allegations, though, since you know about the inside of dragon dyce.[/quote]
I’ve talked to him before actually, and hes still not in Dragon Dyce.

Read full topic

Also, dyces isn’t banned. Chatted with him a few days ago.

And as for is I was hit-Yes but nothing that changes my source of income. I won’t go into details, but what I will say is I had multiple people in a clan that was banned supplying me with daily fee’s for buying them in. This clan had been declining though, and thus means less competition for another clan which I funded a few people. I was, nor will I ever be at risk for ban because of the measures I take to insure no traces can be made back to me.

However, I have jagex mod confirmation that everyone now is being watched like a hawk in the dice clans.[/quote]

Just because he banned you for that mishap with the IP addresses doesn’t make him a bad guy. As far as the greedy goes, that’s a whole different situation that I doubt you even know much about. I’m not defending the guy, I’m simply pointing out that Kozs doesn’t really know what he’s talking about here. I won’t deny most of your allegations, though, since you know about the inside of dragon dyce.
